115180.「装備品の登録で ございますね！\n こちらについては 少々 説明がございますの:
Equipment registration, right? There's a little more to it than that... According to the rules of the game, you can only bring a
total of 50 pieces of equipment for 3 fellow monsters into battle... If you change the effects of the equipment you've registered
here, you'll need to register it again... Please select up to 50 pieces of equipment to be used in the match!

272474.「あら？ <pc>様は 登録できる\n 装備品を お持ちではないようですわ。\n:
Oh?<pc> You don't seem to have any equipment that can
be registered...<end>

272475.「あら？ こちらの倉庫には 登録できる\n 装備品が 入っていないようですわ。\:
What? This warehouse doesn't seem to contain
any equipment that can be registered...<end>

272487.「申し訳ないのですが\n ５キャラコースの登録が 確認できないので\n ５キャラ:
I'm sorry, but I can't confirm that you've
registered for the 5-Character Course, so you
can't use the 5-Character Warehouse...<end>

272488.「申し訳ないのですが 倉庫拡張サービスの\n 追加倉庫＋１が 確認できないので\:
I'm sorry, but we cannot confirm that you are
using the Extra Storage +1 service. This extra
storage therefore cannot be used.
<end>
